title: Dream Big
synopsis: We've allowed ourselves to imagine wiki with many possible features working together well. We do this to find interesting steps along the way.

title: Using a Wiki For your Notebook
Welcome Visitors
synopsis: This is my ([[Julian Elve]]) "forage" site, where I collect information of interest without worrying about overall site structure

title: Why use Federated Wiki for journalling
synopsis: I think [[Federated Wiki]] has huge potential for  using as a journal that escapes the constraints of [[StreamMode]]
